verses.verse: And it came to pass in the days <WH3117> of Amraphel <WH569> king <WH4428> of Shinar <WH8152>, Arioch <WH746> king <WH4428> of Ellasar <WH495>, Chedorlaomer <WH3540> king <WH4428> of Elam <WH5867>, and Tidal <WH8413> king <WH4428> of Goiim <WH1471>,

that they made <WH6213> war <WH4421> with <WH854> Bera <WH1298> king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467>, and with Birsha <WH1306> king <WH4428> of Gomorrah <WH6017>, Shinab <WH8134> king <WH4428> of Admah <WH126>, and Shemeber <WH8038> king <WH4428> of Zeboiim <WH6636>, and the king <WH4428> of Bela <WH1106> (the same is <WH1931> Zoar <WH6820>).
All these joined together <WH2266> in the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708> (the same <WH1931> is the Salt <WH4417> Sea <WH3220>).
Twelve <WH6240> years <WH8141> they served <WH5647> Chedorlaomer <WH3540>, and in the thirteenth <WH7969> year <WH8141> they rebelled <WH4775>.

And in the fourteenth <WH6240> year <WH8141> came <WH935> Chedorlaomer <WH3540>, and the kings <WH4428> that were with him <WH5221>, and smote the Rephaim <WH7497> in Ashteroth-karnaim <WH6255>, and the Zuzim <WH2104> in Ham <WH1990>, and the Emim <WH368> in Shaveh-kiriathaim <WH7741>,
and the Horites <WH2752> in their mount <WH2042> Seir <WH8165>, unto Elparan <WH364>, which is by <WH5921> the wilderness <WH4057>.

And they returned <WH7725>, and came <WH935> to <WH413> En-mishpat <WH5880> (the same is Kadesh <WH6946>), and smote <WH5221> all the country <WH7704> of the Amalekites <WH6003>, and also the Amorites <WH567>, that dwelt <WH3427> in Hazazon-tamar <WH2688>.

And there went out <WH3318> the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467>, and the king <WH4428> of Gomorrah <WH6017>, and the king <WH4428> of Admah <WH126>, and the king <WH4428> of Zeboiim <WH6636>, and the king <WH4428> of Bela <WH1106> (the same <WH1931> is Zoar <WH6820>); and they set <WH6186> the battle <WH4421> in array against them in the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708>;

against Chedorlaomer <WH3540> king <WH4428> of Elam <WH5867>, and Tidal <WH8413> king <WH4428> of Goiim <WH1471>, and Amraphel <WH569> king <WH4428> of Shinar <WH8152>, and Arioch <WH746> king <WH4428> of Ellasar <WH495>; four <WH702> kings <WH4428> against the five <WH2568>.

Now the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708> was full of <WH875> slime pits <WH875>; and the kings <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017> fled <WH5127>, and they fell <WH5307> there <WH7604>, and they that remained fled <WH5127> to the mountain <WH2022>.
And they took <WH3947> all the goods <WH7399> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017>, and all their victuals <WH400>, and went their way <WH3212>.
And they took <WH3947> Lot <WH3876>, Abram <WH87>'s brother <WH251>'s son <WH1121>, who dwelt <WH3427> in Sodom <WH5467>, and his goods <WH7399>, and departed <WH3212>.

And there came <WH935> one that had escaped <WH6412>, and told <WH5046> Abram <WH87> the Hebrew <WH5680>: now he dwelt <WH7931> by the oaks <WH436> of Mamre <WH4471>, the Amorite <WH567>, brother <WH251> of Eshcol <WH812>, and brother <WH251> of Aner <WH6063>; and these were confederate <WH1167> with Abram <WH87>.

And when Abram <WH87> heard <WH8085> that his brother <WH251> was taken captive <WH7617>, he led forth <WH7324> his trained <WH2593> men <WH3211>, born in his house <WH1004>, three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and eighteen <WH6240>, and pursued <WH7291> as far as Dan <WH1835>.

And he divided <WH2505> himself against them by night <WH3915>, he and his servants <WH5650>, and smote <WH5221> them <WH7291>, and pursued them unto Hobah <WH2327>, which is on the left hand <WH8040> of Damascus <WH1834>.
And he brought back <WH7725> all the goods <WH7399>, and also brought back <WH7725> his brother <WH251> Lot <WH3876>, and his goods <WH7399>, and the women <WH802> also <WH5971>, and the people.

And the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him <WH310>, after his return <WH7725> from the slaughter <WH5221> of Chedorlaomer <WH3540> and the kings <WH4428> that were with him <WH6010>, at the vale of Shaveh <WH7740> (the same <WH1931> is the King <WH4428>'s Vale <WH6010>).
And Melchizedek <WH4442> king <WH4428> of Salem <WH8004> brought forth <WH3318> bread <WH3899> and wine <WH3196>: and he was priest <WH3548> of God <WH410> Most High <WH5945>.
And he blessed <WH1288> him <WH559>, and said, Blessed <WH1288> be Abram <WH87> of God <WH410> Most High <WH5945>, possessor <WH7069> of heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>:
and blessed <WH1288> be God <WH410> Most High <WH5945>, who hath delivered <WH4042> thine enemies <WH6862> into thy hand <WH3027>. And he gave <WH5414> him a tenth of all <WH4643>.
And the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> said <WH559> unto Abram <WH87>, Give <WH5414> me the persons <WH5315>, and take <WH3947> the goods to thyself <WH7399>.

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> to the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467>, I have lifted up <WH7311> my hand <WH3027> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, God <WH410> Most High <WH5945>, possessor <WH7069> of heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>,
that I will not <WH518> take a thread <WH2339> nor a shoe-latchet <WH5275> nor aught <WH518> that <WH3947> is thine <WH559>, lest thou shouldest say, I have made <WH6238> Abram <WH87> rich <WH6238>:

save <WH1107> only that which <WH834> the young men <WH5288> have eaten <WH398>, and the portion <WH2506> of the men <WH582> that went <WH1980> with <WH854> me <WH6063>, Aner, Eshcol <WH812>, and Mamre <WH4471>; let them <WH1992> take <WH3947> their portion <WH2506>.
